#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
double fact(double a)
{
    if(a==1 || a==0)
        return 1;
    else
        return a*fact(a-1);
}
int main()
{
    double num,x,y,num2;
    int cases,i,j;  //i: no of digits with base 10 || j: no. of digits with base 2
    cin>>cases;
    //cout<<fact(x)/fact(12)<<" "<<sizeof(x);//(fact(y)*fact(x-y));
    for(int k=0; k<cases; k++)
    {
        cin>>x>>y;
        num=fact(x)/(fact(y)*fact(x-y));
        num2=num;//cout<<num<<" ";
        for(i=0;num2>=1;num2/=10,i++);
        for(j=0;num>=1;num/=2,j++);

        cout<<i<<" "<<j<<endl;
    }
}
